item.title: SESSION 1 RECAP
item.description:
night - March 14 (Wed), 6584

a hooded gnome walks into The Last Line Tavern and gets a key to room 204 from the bartender named Cel
a redheaded half-elf and rich-looking wood elf come downstairs from their rooms
the redhead buys a shot at the bar, and the wood elf takes a seat at a table
a mysterious-looking half-elf is whispering to someone at a table under the stairs
the tavern’s newly hired human helper takes a bottle of wine upstairs to room 204
The roomskeeper Xavier loudly summons everyone in the tavern for a game of darts
everyone but Cel, the hired helper, the wood elf, and the hooded gnome play
the wood elf notices a golden sphere camera floating in the corner of the tavern and alerts Cel
Cel calls for Xavier to get the hired helper from upstairs to help reach the camera
Kaimop, the hired helper, knocks the camera down
shadowy creatures start appearing from the shadows in the tavern
3 regulars of the tavern make their escape, but everyone else stays and kills the creatures
Cel nearly dies trying to get to Xavier
3 military personnel bang on the tavern doors and enter
the mysterious half-elf quickly hides behind the tavern bar and the hooded gnome magically blinks out of sight
one of the military personnel, Members, introduces herself as one of The Queen's Cinders
Lt. Nuyi goes back and forth with Kaimop over who is in the tavern
Lt. Nuyi talks about similar attacks happening around Anemone for “months now”
Lt. Nuyi tries to recruit those who just fought - giving an audience with The Queenas a form of payment - but is met with resistance
the wood elf, Thia, introduces herself with just her first name
Lt. Nuyi explains how to get into contact with her in case anyone changes their minds
before leaving, the other 2 military personnel heal Cel and Xavier and wipe their memories
the hooded gnome then reappears and reveals that the tavern is enclosed in a domain and that no one can leave for at least a few more hours

item.title: SESSION 2 RECAP
item.description:
night - March 14 (Wed)

because everyone remaining at the tavern is unable to leave due to the military domain, everyone goes to sleep
the hooded gnome wakes first and leaves the tavern - only coming back for a short moment to read a letter sent via cycrane - to travel to a satellite temple of the Inventor in Akkins
the mysterious half-elf leaves the tavern and returns back to his fancy hotel in the 4th Ward District
the half-elf has a tense conversation with his father at the fancy hotel before his father leaves for work
the half-elf sends a letter to his associates at the fancy hotel
day - March 15 (Thu)

the hooded gnome uses her connections to speak directly to Reverend Symon and the cleric Sister Eryn at the Inventor satellite temple
the hooded gnome sends a letter to her father and her twin brother
Sister Eryn feels negative/dark intent surrounding the hooded gnome
the hooded gnome uses the temple’s small library to search for answers
the redheaded half-elf (Wynn), Thia and Kaimop discover that they have star markings on them
the owners of the tavern don’t see the star markings
the trio head to the Inventor satellite temple and meet with the hooded gnome (Diaspro)
Kaimop mails his monthly letters to his family
the mysterious half-elf (Irosys) makes it the same temple and meets with everyone
Diaspro catches everyone up on what she has discovered/found out about the star markings
Wynn talks about the message she received while unconscious
Sister Eryn senses negative/dark intent from everyone but Wynn
Sister Eryn physically touches where the marking is on Irosys, but her eyes turn black and she faints

item.title: SESSION 3 RECAP
item.description:
day - March 15 (Thu)

Sister Erynis unconscious and the group is unable to wake her. She seems to be physically alright.
Reverend Symon is brought in and he calls for an AoP cleric
Royal AoP storm the temple and arrest a man named Rus on the grounds of stealing from Osiris Corp
Reverend Symon is unable to stop the arrest and eventually turns to the part and talks about Rus
the group learned this info:
Rus' full name is Russel Tally
Rus works in the white thal mines
In recent months, Rus has started to cough more and has noticeably started to cover up more
Rus has even needed family to come and help him leave the temple
Reverend Symon tells the group that Rus lives on the west side of Firebox, and he gives Diaspro letters back from her father and twin brother
the group decide to head back to the Last Line tavern, and on their way out of the temple they cross paths with Maddy, an AoP cleric
at the Last Line tavern, Diaspro listens in on a conversation between Xavier and a pink-skinned tiefling
Diaspro receives another letter via cycrane, and Kaimop receives letters from his family
the group decides to split up to gather more intel and they plan to meet at Rus' home the next day
Kaimop and Wynn travel up to northern Anemone to visit Kaimop's family
Thia and Diaspro travel to Edelweiss to meet with Diaspro's father and sister at The Exhibit
Irosys travels back to his hotel

item.title: SESSION 4 RECAP
item.description:
night - March 15 (Thu)

while traveling to Kaimop's family's tavern, Kaimop and Wynn are attacked by a mutated version of one of the creatures they fought at the Last Line tavern
Kaimop and Wynn spend the night at his family's tavern
Thia & Diaspro travel to the Exhibit in Edelweiss to talk to Diaspro's father
Diaspro tells her father everything that's happened to her, and her dad reveals that her uncle was the one that warned him to stay out of Anemone
while traveling to the Lietbriet ancestral estate, Thia, Diaspro and Diaspro's father are attacked by a cloaked figure
Thia charms the figure, and they learn that the figure is a member of the Black Cloak Coalition (BCC), and has an objective to kill Thia Aldershine
Thia & Diaspro spend the night at the estate
day - March 16 (Fri)

after talking to Kaimop's mother, Kaimop and Wynn head to the mining circle to talk to one of Kaimop's work friends
while talking to Kaimop's work friend, they learn that she:
doesn't recognize any of the symptoms that Kaimop & Wynn describe
doesn't know anyone in the white thal mining group, but can do some digging
doesn't recall there ever being research into white thal exposure
vaguely remembers one of her coworkers, Gord, talking about Rus
Kaimop & Wynn then head back into Copper Lane to talk to Kaimop's close friend, Mariana
Thia & Diaspro spend their morning reading books from the Lietbriet library
they learn that:
many Lietbriets joined the military during the Scorched Petals, but not many since
in the past century, the Lietbriets have been switching metal components in their machinery to white thal
the Argus family patented camera typically has a separate box that streams/stores the feed of the camera up to 2 miles
Thia & Diaspro then start making their way back to Anemone to meet with the rest of the group at Rus' house

item.title: SESSION 4.5 RECAP
item.description:
night - March 15 (Thu)

Irosys returns to his hotel, The Daydream Hotel, and waits for his father to return
later in the night, Irosys snoops around his father’s hotel room and finds nothing out of the ordinary
day - March 16 (Fri)

Irosys wakes up and realizes his father never returned to the hotel
Irosys then receives an undated note and decides to head to the corporate office of Osiris Corp. located in northern Hollownest, Anemone
Irosys sneaks into Osiris Corp. by disguising himself as a newly hired employee, and he learns the names of all the current white thal miners
Irosys investigates some of the local restaurants and finds that his father never arrived at Celine’s to have lunch with Zeke
Irosys then starts making his way towards Rus’ house

item.title: SESSION 5 RECAP
item.description:
day - March 16 (Fri)

Kaimop and Wynn (K&W) arrive at Mariana’s house and let themselves in
Kaimop convinces Mariana to show her blackened fingertips, but Wynn is unable to discern anything about them
K&W learn that Mariana’s deceased fiancé, Gabriel, use to work in the white thal mines before dying in a sudden cave collapse
K&W borrow Gabriel’s lockerbox and discover the false bottom. They take a metal key with an engraved number “10” from the false bottom
K&W then head towards Rus’ house
before getting on a bullet train back to Anemone, Diaspro and Thia (D&T) stop at Eora’s Bank and check their bank accounts/withdraw money
K&W and D&T met with each other before making their way to Rus’ house
these 4 met with Rus’ wife, Ava, and promise to pay for Rus’ bond in exchange for her telling them everything she knows. Irosys arrives at Rus’ house.
Ava gives the party Rus’ lockerbox and inside was:
picture of current generation of white thal miners
a keycard of Zerin’s
a note with an unusual drawing at the end of it
the party head to the 4th Ward District AoP precinct to somehow talk to Rus
the party devise a plan to get Kaimop arrested, thus giving them a reason to be at the precinct
Diaspro pays Rus’ bond and asks demands he be transported to her mother
Diaspro and Rus have a mental conversation, and she confirms that he is unable to reveal much (in relation to the kidnapping of Irosys’ father). However, he does plead he never stole any white thal
the party leaves the precinct and come to conclusion that they head to the Mining Circle

item.title: SESSION 6 RECAP
item.description:
night - March 16 (Fri)

the party returns to The Last Line Tavern and go to bed early
day - March 17 (Sat)

early the next morning, the party discuss a plan for sneaking into the mines
as part of the plan, Kaimop and Wynn get mining clothes/gear while Diaspro, Thia and Irosys go to Eora’s Bank to withdraw money
Diaspro withdraws enough money to cover the cost of 5 potions
while out and about, each member of the party sends out letters (some thinking it might be for the last time)

item.title: SESSION 7 RECAP
item.description:
night - March 17 (Sat)

in order to sneak past the guards to the mines, the party plans to create a explosion that will distract the guards while they slip their way past the gate
while sneaking around, the party notices the upped security due to the recent theft of white thal
after successfully sneaking around the Ivory Guard patrolling the cave entrance, the party uses the symbol found on Rus' letter to navigate the different pathways
while making their way through the mines, the party - minus Diaspro - sinks into loose gravel and fall 60ft into a large cave hub
Thia is the first to notice a large spider along the roof of the hub
the large spider jumps down despite Thia's attempt to make it fall asleep, and the battle begins

item.title: SESSION 8 RECAP
item.description:
night - Mar 17 (Sat)

the party - minus Diaspro - kill both the large and medium cave spiders. after killing the spiders, the party rushes to pick a burrow opening that could lead out of the den.
while looking for a way out, Irosys peaks into a burrow opening and sees an opened spider cocoon
soon after choosing an opening, the medium spider that Thia had put to sleep before the battle wakes up and chases them up a narrow crawlspace that leads out of the den
once the party digs their way out, they travel up one of the mining pathways that hasn't been walked in a long time. they go through a series of tunnels before walking on a path that has lanterns hanging from above
eventually the party hears sounds of metal clinking and clashing, and Irosys scouts ahead to investigate
Irosys stumbles upon a scene of 2 opposing sky pirate factions (Aerosol and The Yuan) fighting and arguing. before returning to the group, Irosys overhears the The Yuan members wanting someone returned to them.


after trying to catch anyone from the party as they sink and fall through loose gravel, Diaspro shouts the remaining directions down to them before continuing through the mines
after following the directions, Diaspro makes it to a dead-in as the path ahead looks caved-in. investigating around, Diaspro uncovers a trap door, and uses the rope to travel deeper underground
Diaspro then travels and explores an array of different tunnels before sticking to one that has a metal door in its side. making her way inside, she looks around a locker-room like space before taking a blue-lit lantern, and a black dagger that a skeleton hand was clutching closely
making her way out of the room and path into the mining pathways, Diaspro follows the similar sound of metal clinking and clashing, and joins the rest of the party

item.title: SESSION 9 RECAP
item.description:
night - Mar 17 (Sat)

after regrouping with Diaspro, the full party discuss how to get around the Yuan and Aerosol fighting
after Irosys does some reconnaissance, the party enacts a plan that distracts and obscures the vision of the sky pirates as the party sneaks past them
the party fails to sneak past the pirates without being noticed, and Yuan members chase them down a narrow corridor that leads to a chasm with more members
before things could escalate into a full on fight, Disapro talks to one of the higher ranked members until Madam Dolores Lotus arrives
the Madam and Diaspro have an argument and Diaspro doubles down on the lie as to why she and the rest of party are in the mines
before the Yuan leave, a few things are hinted:
in certain circles, there is a bounty out for people like Irosys
they used an alternative means of leaving the mines, probably by air
the Madam's son is the reason why they were there
the party then traces back Diaspro's steps towards the end of the puzzle they were originally following
in a small cavity to the side, the party meets a white thal miner named Otto
takeaways from their conversation with Otto:
Thia reads his mind and relives a meeting between him, Zeke and a mysterious person during a NDA meeting
the only features Thia can pick out is that the mysterious figure has a black band on their left ring finger, an Esemone alumni pin on their expensive-looking shirt, and is holding a red crystal
then the party asks Otto why he is alone, and Otto answers vaguely
Irosys reveals his face and asks Otto earnestly if he's seen his dad, Otto denies ever seeing him
Diaspro then offers Otto 10 gold pieces if he answers honestly, but Otto declines saying "It's not what he needs" and that "It's not enough gold anyway"
Otto, in so many words, hints that one of his own is "in trouble" and needs a high-level mage for something
before the party leaves, Kaimop gives Otto the address to the Last Line Tavern and implores him to meet with them tomorrow to talk more about what he needs
the party then retraces their steps until they make their way out of cave 10
minus Diaspro, the party uses potions to either turn invisible or into mist and sneak past the Ivory Guards
Diaspro gets caught by said Ivory Guards, and her forged letter doesn't fool them

item.title: The Walls
item.description:
The entire kingdom is surrounded by physical and magical walls. The physical walls between cities are thiner and shorter than the outermost walls. This allows for air and ground travel between cities without seeing anything beyond the kingdom. The outermost walls are about thirteen miles (20.9 km) in height, and the inner cities' walls are about 6 miles (9.65 km) in height.
The physical walls seemingly extend infinitely underground, and attempts to find the end in the past has lead to devastating casualties.
All air travel has a maximum altitude before simply being unable to work. The maximum altitude is the height of the outermost walls.
The magical walls are best seen from the sky. A iridescent shimmer can be seen in certain lighting from above as it makes a seemingly dome shape across the kingdom. Magic users and philosophers have hypothesized that the day and night cycle is simulated by the magical barrier. Records show all types of weather patterns to have occurred in the past, but in recent centuries extreme weather changes have come far and few between.


Due to the manner in which the kingdom was formed, there has always been a startling lack of a fertile soil. In the beginning, all fertile soil was blessed by Emer and given to the Royal Family to manage. Only this blessed soil has the capacity to grow life.
In modern times, having this soil has been a sign of great wealth or an indication of close ties with the Royal Family.
When The Garden was being constructed, the Family donated blessed soil to the temple. Over the centuries an enormous tree has grown from it, and has become a symbol of a potential future.


Other than the blessed soil, water is the second most regulated resource in Eora. Initially it was also given to the Royal Family to manage, but as Eora grew the Family handed the responsibility to the Head Councilman of Water and their respective boards.
All water is sourced from the Trench. The Trench is a chasm of groundwater the circles around Hollyhock. The only time the public has access ti the Trench is on Blessings of the Waterbearer. On this day (that occurs once every eight years), the Trench is opened in a feat of engineering, and the Waterbearer pours rain only into the chasm.
Water is mostly used for hydroponic farming. With the list of crops being reduced to only potatoes, wheat and rice overtime.



The crops that remain are only potatoes, wheat and rice. Rice is expensive, and is mostly seen in upper-class districts and cities. Wheat and potatoes are more plentiful and cheap, and are a staple in most dishes.
Other produce, spices, condiments, etc. are now chemically manufactured.
Meat and poultry are plentiful and are also a staple in most dishes.
Drinkable water is seen as a symbol of wealth, and is expensive to purchase pure. Most people drink milk (or diluted milk), manufactured juices or alcohol.


Buildings and structures dating back to the beginning of Eora were made primarily of wood. As the kingdom grew, newer constructions were built from metal and concrete. Similar to drinkable water, having pure wooden fixtures is a sign of wealth and status.

item.title: Clash in Akkins
item.description: After fifty years of abuse, the people of Anemone clashed physically with the Ivory Guards stationed in Akkins, Anemone. The clash began when someone threw a molotov cocktail at an Ivory Guard. Five Ivory Guards and eighteen civilians died in the altercation.

item.title: Princess Esemone is Kidnapped
item.description:
#timeline #eoratimeline
While on a campaign tour around the kingdom, the princess was kidnapped somewhere in Anemone.

item.title: The Condemnation
item.description:
#timeline #eoratimeline
Beginning
The 5th Queen started to sweep through Anemone looking for her daughter's kidnappers. She upped taxes, restricted inter-city trade and travel, and increased the Ivory Guard presence in Anemone.
Ending
After her mother's sudden passing, the 6th Queen ended The Condemnation on Anemone and officially declared her sister as dead. The 6th Queen later discovered that Emer extremists kidnapped her sister in an act of defiance against the Waterbearer, and killed her. Her sister's body was never found, and the extremists were publicly executed.

item.title: The Neverending Storms
item.description: Angered by the Clash in Akkins and emboldened with the Waterbearer patronage, Queen Enna summoned devastating storms all across Anemone. Ivory Guards utilized military-grade domains to create safe zones in strategic locations across the city. In order to enter these safe zones, each citizen of Anemone was throughly checked. As none of the cities were designed to withstand such weather disasters, sections of Anemone were flooded for months afterwards. Repairs took years to complete.

item.title: The Scorched Petals
item.description:
#timeline #eoratimeline
Civil war. The kingdom was divided into two main factions: those who still supported the Queen and the Royal Family after The Condemnation, and those that did not. Hollyhock, Edelweiss and Valerian versus Anemone and Amaryllis. The civil war only ended after the Family did a public apology and gave tens of thousands of gold towards Anemone's reconstruction.
The Queen's Cinders were created during this time. The Yuan was created during this time. Guild of Mechanics was legitimized during this time.

item.title: Description
item.description:
The building itself is elevated, with a small staircase leading to the front entrance. On either side of the staircase are large white columns that go from ceiling to floor.


The front area consists of a lobby that showcases exhibits of older mechanisms native to Anemone. The mechanisms are mining tool and manufacturing technologies. The front area also consists of a front desk.
The back section of the temple is the main area. It consists of parallel pews all facing an artsy clock on an intricately designed podium. On either side of the podium are stairs that lead to the second floor.
The second floor has three doors leading to offices to the western side. The northern side has a door leading to the temple's library. The eastern side has a door leading to a small storage room. From the second floor, the entirety of the first floor can be seen.


A single-story room with shelves of books lining almost every wall. In the center is a cluster of tables, and pressed against the western wall is a couch. Most books only date back a couple of centuries, and the few that don't consist of common texts.


Reverend Symon
Sister Eryn

item.title: Emer
item.description:
In official texts, Emer is imagined as an older woman with brown coiled hair. Her eyes are typically brown or green, but her outfit varies wildly by artist. She’s been depicted wearing farmer clothes, extravagant dresses, and commoner outfits. Her immaterial forms include rumbling earth, crunched leaves, and sounds of nature.
Emer’s symbol is of a rose, although any plant imagery can be attributed to her.
Historians believe her to be the oldest of the True Gods, and they read about her maturity and wisdom in solving conflicts of long past. Emer is viewed as a gentle and maternal-like figure, although in recent centuries her influence has started to become overshadowed by her fellow gods.

Emer is the goddess of soil, creatures and remembrance. Her followers are often found in roles relating to preservation. Famous historians, record-keepers, and scribes are known to be devout believers. Farmers are also known to ask for her blessing over crops and animals.

Over six thousand years ago, the Shadow Flood swept across the lands and consumed everything in its path. To protect those remaining, the 3 True Gods created the Kingdom of Eora as a haven. Vulcan the Inventor, created the kingdom's foundations using his omnipotent knowledge of technology. Tempest the Waterbearer, graced the kingdom with water, its primary resource. Emer of the Soil gave the kingdom life giving it a precious amount of soil, crops, and animals. 
Soon after establishing the Kingdom of Eora, the True Gods hand-picked and blessed a Dark Elven family (the Pacifics) that would become the Royal Family. The Waterbearer then chose the First Queen of Eora, and the line of succession has run through women ever since. Once the surviving populace was safe within Eora’s walls, the True Gods spent and continued to spend their time battling against the Shadow Flood. They do this with the hope that one day the survivors will be able to walk the earth freely once again.



Information.


UNKOWN TO THE PARTY

item.title: The Waterbearer
item.description:
In official texts, the Waterbearer is depicted as a willowy woman with dark, liquid-like hair. Her eyes and outfit defer by the artist, but typically she has either blue or black colored eyes, and wears an extravagant dress in shades of blue. The Waterbearer is often shown holding an urn or large bowl, pouring water into fields or into the Trench. Her immaterial forms include crashing/rushing water and calming/booming rain.
The original symbol of the Waterbearer was of a sea shell. In modern times, her worshippers made a water droplet her official symbol.
Stories of the Waterbearer write her as a benevolent being with an incredible temperament and pose. She is a being that rules above all others and is something to look up to.

The Waterbearer is the deity of water, change and choice. Those that follow her are the cornerstones adapting to and creating change. They embody kindness, calmness, and the willingness to “go with the flow.” Their beliefs revolve around the ability to make their own choices and pave their own destiny.

item.title: The Inventor
item.description:
The earliest depictions of the Inventor show him as a whimsical young man. Wavy blond hair and mischievous gray eyes were common features across different illustrations. After the Salvation, his image was aged to be of an older man with graying blond hair and solemn gray eyes. His clothing changes often, and is largely dependent on the current trends. His immaterial forms include the clattering of tools, the hum of running machinery, and the ticking of a clock.
The Inventor’s symbol is of a clock, one of humanity’s greatest inventions.
Due to the earliest recorded images of him, many believe that the Inventor is the youngest of the True Gods. However, he has aged the most over the centuries, and is seen as a great educator and philosopher.

The Inventor is the god of technology, creativity and innovation. His believers can typically be found amongst architects, mechanics and those with a penchant for tinkering. Many renowned inventors attribute some of their greatest inventions to visions from the Inventor. Those that follow him embody the conviction to “try, try, and try again.”

item.title: SESSION 10 RECAP
item.description:
night - Mar 17 (Sat)

the remaining party , either invisible or in mist form, sneak on the next train that takes them out of the Mining Circle
the rest of the party make their way back to the Last Line Tavern (after quickly defeating a shadowy creature on the side of the road), and promptly all go to sleep
while sleeping, Wynn is visited by her patron. through them, Wynn sees a potential future that details fissures running along the magical barrier that surrounds the kingdom. this future is seen as the best outcome


after getting caught by the Ivory Guards stationed outside the western entrance of the mines, Diaspro is taken into custody by one of the guards named Thane
Thane is tasked with taking her to one of the Guard bases in Anemone to be processed for trespassing on private property and forgery of an official document
after getting off the train it's quickly revealed that Thane has no idea where he's going. Diaspro takes this opportunity to take charge and lead them towards the Akkins branch of the Inventor instead
once they arrive, Diaspro has Reverend Symon send an expedited letter to her father asking for a legal aid
Diaspro then refuses to be moved from this location, forcing Thane to call in the local AoP that will arrive the next morning. before going to sleep, Diaspro takes another look through the temple's small library:
she finds a book that talks about a cult that had played a role in the Scorched Petals that was stationed somewhere in the mines
while sleeping, Diaspro has a dream reliving a memory. in the dream, Diaspro embodies someone who standing before a shimmering crack floating above an alter. the dream abruptly cuts off as that someone takes the black dagger in their hands and brings it up to their chest
day - Mar 18 (Sun)

early in the morning the AoP arrive, but Diaspro hides from them until Margret arrives.
